result.title: the animal problem from uri online judge
result.content:
it is just 20% wrong but i couldnt find where is the wrong this is the problem https://www.urionlinejudge.com.br/judge/en/problems/view/1049 and this is the c++ code

include 

using namespace std;
string K1,K2,K3;
int main ()
{

cin >> K1 >> K2 >> K3;

if (K1 == "vertebrado" && K2 == "ave" && K3 == "carnivoro") cout <<"aguia "; else if (K1 == "vertebrado" && K2 == "ave" && K3 == "onivoro") cout <<"pomba "; else if (K1 == "vertebrado" && K2 == "mamifero" && K3 == "onivoro") cout <<"homem "; else if (K1 == "vertebrado" && K2 == "mamifero" && K3 == "herbivoro") cout <<"vaca ";

else if (K1 == "invertebrado" && K2 == "inseto" && K3 == "hematofago") cout <<"pulga "; else if (K1 == "invertebrado" && K2 == "inseto" && K3 == "herbivoro") cout <<"lagarata "; else if (K1 == "invertebrado" && K2 == "anelideo" && K3 == "hematofago") cout <<"sanguessuga "; else if (K1 == "invertebrado" && K2 == "anelideo" && K3 == "onivoro") cout <<"minhoca"<<endl; return 0; }
